relation: Great for these types of students
security guard on site at all times.
Go to church and reward myself with a movie often.
Food is great. Salad bar is the best. Nothing is as good as mama's cooking.
You will be home sick the first few weeks. The good news it will wear off. Do not party remember why you are here.
Take good notes in class. Study the material and make good scores on test. Never miss class.
Focus on your grades. Keep your head up and remember you can do this. Never give up the reward is when you earn your degree.

William Carey staff is friendly and very helpful. This College has the can do attitude and the professors are great and very understanding. I would recommend my friends to attend William Cary University.

Reviewer has been to campus. 7 out of 10 people found this review useful. 1 person found it offensive. 1 of 16 Virgina from Bay Spring, MS Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: What to do for fun William Carey University is minutes away from the mall, food places, movies, zoo, skating rink and more and a short distance drive to the Miss Gulf Coast Food and Dining Wonderful food and dining room has great cooks. Dorm Life NEVER STAYED IN DORM BUT HAVE TOURED AND THEY'RE GREAT Academic Rigor William Carey University is a Superior Rating in Learning Tips for prospective students Never give up. Follow your dreams. Take it one day at a time. In three sentences William Carey University is a wonderful school for prospective students looking for a pleasant atmosphere and Christian atmosphere. William Carey University really strives to encourage every student to never give up on their visions. Willaim Carey University is a school I'm proud to be a student at.
